```{r get_data}

```
```{r data_exploration}

``` 

```{r get_data}
	
head(data)
describe(data)
#Convert '0' values into NA
data[, 2:7][data[, 2:7] == 0] <- NA
#visualize the missing data
missmap(data)
```
```{r get_data}

ggplot(data, aes(Age, colour = capital.gain)) +
```
